quote: You as soon as possible need to begin to treat your business like a business.
why_clipworthy: It encapsulates the core message of the episode about business management.
suggested_hook: Are you treating your real estate career like a true business?

quote: Most people need to start with better data. The data takes the form of good bookkeeping.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the actionable step of improving financial data management.
suggested_hook: Is your bookkeeping up to par? Here's why it matters.
